sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The XMMS package contains xmms, xmms-config, gnomexmss and wmxmms.

sect3.title: xmms
sect3.para: XMMS, which stands for X MultiMedia System, is a program comparable in function with WinAMP. Its main function is playing audio files like WAV and MP3. It can be extended with plugins to play a number of other audio or video formats. Its look can be customized with WinAMP style skins.

sect3.title: xmms-config
sect3.para: This script is used by other programs which need to link with xmms to retrieve the library and include paths.

sect3.title: gnomexmms
sect3.para: This is an applet for the GNOME desktop environment that will dock into the GNOME panel. From the applet you can start and control xmms.

sect3.title: wmxmms
sect3.para: wmxmms is a dock applet for the Window Maker window manager. From the applet you can start and control xmms.
